summary: This is an email from December 11, 2008, forwarding a message about an upcoming article in a Palm Beach paper regarding Jeffrey Epstein's work release. The forwarded message indicates the article will quote individuals named Herman and Goldberger.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses an upcoming article about Epstein's work release, indicating he is the central figure of the report.

persons.context: Mentioned as one of the individuals quoted in the upcoming article about Epstein's work release.

persons.name: Goldberger

events.title: Email about upcoming Epstein article
events.description: An email is sent forwarding information about an article coming out the next day regarding Jeffrey Epstein's work release.

events.title: Publication of Epstein work release article
events.description: An article about Jeffrey Epstein's work release is scheduled to be published in a small Palm Beach paper.

keyFacts: An article about Jeffrey Epstein's work release was scheduled for publication in a Palm Beach paper on or around December 12, 2008.
The article was expected to quote individuals named Herman and Goldberger.
The email suggests the information about the article was being circulated among interested parties, possibly to preempt or manage its impact.
